General.Name: Shanghai Fosun Pharmaceutical (Group) Co. Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Fosun Pharmaceutical (Group) Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells pharmaceutical products in Mainland China and internationally. It operates in five segments: Pharmaceutical Manufacturing, Medical Devices and Medical Diagnosis, Healthcare Service, Pharmaceutical Distribution and Retail, Other Business segments. The company offers pharmaceutical products in the areas of tumor, immune modulation, anti-infection, API's and intermediate, metabolism, alimentary system, cardiovascular and central nervous system. It also provides medical devices and diagnostic products. In addition, the company offers health care and hospital management services, and investment management services. Further, it engages in retail and wholesale distribution of medicines. Shanghai Fosun Pharmaceutical (Group) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Shanghai, China.
